attributes.action: Prevent the classification of e-liquids containing nicotine as a medicine as defined by the MHRA
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to prevent the classification of e-liquids containing nicotine as a "medicine" as defined by the MHRA on the 12th June 2013.

The right for retailers to continue to sell nicotine e-liquids without licensing or regulation by the MHRA or NICE.
